RgbColor Struct Reference

#include <RgbColor.h>

Collaboration diagram for RgbColor:

Detailed Description

Color definition in a RGB colorspace.

This struct represents the channel decomposition of a color in a RGB colorspace. The color is stored using a normalized value between 0 and 1 for each RGB channel.

Author:

Definition at line 15 of file RgbColor.cpp.

RgbColor::RgbColor ( double  redChannel,
double  greenChannel,
double  blueChannel 
)

Constructor.

Initializes a RgbColor object with the RGB channels set to the values passed. Since the color must be expressed using a RGB scale of 256 possible values normalized between 0 and 1, any value out of this scale will be truncated

Parameters:
redChannel Color value of the red channel
greenChannel Color value of the green channel
blueChannel Color value of the blue channel
